extension.summary: SafeKodi helps to identify security issues of installed addons
extension.description:
SafeKodi is built on top of de-kodi, a tool that checks the safety of addons (Please refer to our paper which will appear in the World Wide Web Conference 2020). SafeKodi will examine the addons installed on local machine, and provide security suggestions based on the results obtained with de-kodi.
SafeKodi also provides the users with the quick option to disable the addons.
The default skin Estuary is recommended when using this add-on. Otherwise, it is possible that some information is not shown.
Note that the addon information will be sent to safekodi.com ananomously for obtaining the up-to-date security suggestions for the addons.
